# thunder_snmp_server_enable_traps_ssl (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider  "thunder"  {
    address  = var.dut9049
    username = var.UserName
    password = var.Password
}
resource  "thunder_snmp_server_enable_traps_ssl"   "SnMPServerEnableTrapsSsl"  {
    server_certificate_error= 1
}
```
